sentences.sentence: Divertimento in D major, K. 136, Salzburg Symphony No. 1.
sentences.translation: 大调嬉游曲，K . 136(第一萨尔茨堡交响曲)。

sentences.sentence: I hope that with my efforts, it can make this divertimento more widely accepted and enjoyed by everyone.
sentences.translation: 希望通过本人的努力，能让这部套曲更加广泛地被大家接受和喜欢。

sentences.sentence: Therefore, it is a very meaningful and valuable work to make in-depth and meticulous research of this excellent vocal divertimento.
sentences.translation: 因此，对这部优秀声乐套曲做深入细致的研究是一件非常有意义和价值的工作。
